ganesh_stotras.name: Ganesha Pancharatnam
ganesh_stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
ganesh_stotras.description: A five-gem hymn composed by Adi Shankaracharya praising Lord Ganesha as the remover of obstacles and giver of wisdom.

structure.theme: Devotion, removal of obstacles, divine grace

ganesh_stotras.name: Ganesha Atharvashirsha
ganesh_stotras.description: A sacred Upanishadic text declaring Ganesha as the Supreme Brahman, the manifestation of Om, and the cosmic reality.

ganesh_stotras.name: Ganesha Stotra from Narada Purana (Ganesha Kavacham)
ganesh_stotras.description: A protective armor prayer invoking various forms of Ganesha to guard the body and mind.

ganesh_stotras.name: Ganesha Moola Mantra Stotra
ganesh_stotras.description: A hymn built around the core Ganesha moola mantra 'Om Gam Ganapataye Namaha', praising his cosmic form.

ganesh_stotras.name: Vakratunda Mahakaya Stotra
ganesh_stotras.description: One of the most popular short stotras used before starting any work or puja.

ganesh_stotras.name: Gajananam Bhoota Ganadi Sevitam
ganesh_stotras.description: A popular Ganesha dhyana shloka describing the one-tusked Lord, the remover of obstacles.

ganesh_stotras.name: Sri Siddhi Vinayaka Stotram
ganesh_stotras.description: A hymn dedicated to the Siddhi-Vinayaka form of Ganesha, granting fulfillment and success.

ganesh_stotras.name: Ganapati Stotram from Rudra Samhita
ganesh_stotras.description: A hymn describing Ganesha as the beloved son of Shiva who grants boons instantly.
